build.production.description: Enables the production output-mode for your bundled files.

build.watch.description: Enables the watcher for your files.

build.entry.description: Defines the build entry for the addon.

build.output.description: Defines the output folder for the bundled file. eg `./builds/UserDetails.plugin.js`

build.filename.description: Defines the output filename for the bundled file.

build.debug.description: Enables debug mode, so a file in `logs/06.29.21.log`
